transcript:
Customer: Hello madam.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, main IndiaMART se Tannu baat kar rahi hu. Abhi message aapne hi kiya tha whatsapp pe mujhe?
Customer: Ha na, maine abhi baat kiya na madam aapse, aapko whatsapp pe hi bhi kiya na.
Executive: Ha ha. Ye Mahesh Kumar ke naam se taraf se hai na? 10160.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir ye number mera save kar lijiye aap aur aap isi number pe call kariyega jab bhi aapko call karna hoga to. Theek hai? Konsa number hai?
Customer: Jo whatsapp pe number aaya hai wahi na?
Executive: Ha ha. Aapke account manager main hu, usi pe number usi number pe aap call kariyega.
Customer: Ha, main ye kehna chah raha madam ki thodi inquiry badni chahiye apne account pe.
Executive: Hmm. Sir dekhiye inquiry abhi jis hisab se aapka aapka catalog kab live hua tha?
Customer: Abhi.
Executive: 18 tarikh ko aur abhi maine last welcome call 28 tarikh ko hi thi na aapki. Ha.
Executive: To humne video meet kari thi. Aapko agar yaad hoga. Ha.
Executive: To 28 ko hi kari thi main sir. To abhi kitna din hua hai? 28 udhar teen, che aur 10 din lagbhag hua hai. 9 10 9 10 din. Usme sir utne mein hi aapke paas last month mein jo inquiry aayi thi. Last month aapke paas jo inquiry aayi wo wo apne paas aayi thi total jo customer ne inquiry post kari 29. Ha.
Customer: Customer ke direct direct call bhi aana chahiye madam.
Executive: Ha, main bata rahi hu sir. 29 inquiry aapke paas aayi aur is month mein aapke paas 13 inquiry aayi hai. Che din mein 13 matlab month ke liye ek din mein do aa rahi hai. Abhi sir apna catalog abhi apni jo company hai wo purani hui nahi hai. 8 10 din hi hue hai. But fir bhi itni aa rahi hai to lead to sir wo to kam hai lekin dhire dhire jaise purani hoti jayegi to mere ko call inquiry aur bhi badhti jayengi. Ha.
Executive: Ha. Hai na sir theek hai? To aur call ke liye aap bol rahe hai to ek number de rahi hu main aapko. Ha.
Executive: A ek number main aapko deti hu. Wo number check kara ya nahi aapne wo dekhiye. Aur dekhiye ye bhi kya kuch spam mein wo block to nahi hai wo number?
Customer: Ek minute madam.
Executive: Ek minute de rahi hu aapko.
Customer: Ha boliye madam.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Hello. Ha boliye madam. Mujhe mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye madam wo number.
Executive: Nahi ye number aur ha sir isko na true caller mein check kar lijiyega ye number ki spam mein to nahi hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Konsa number hai madam wo?
Executive: Jo maine aapko bheja hai sir aap check kariye. Ha.
Executive: Wo number isko pehle to aap IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save kar lijiye. Theek hai? Ha.
Executive: IndiaMART buyer ke naam se aap isko save kar lijiye aur ye bhi abhi aapka net on nahi hai. Net to off hai aapka abhi.
Customer: Net mera on hai madam.
Executive: Off hai sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Net off hai sir aapka net off hai. Mere number ji net net band hai aapka.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam mobile data shuru hai mera.
Executive: Aap mujhe message kariye sir. Ha ek minute.
Executive: Message kariye aap mujhe. Ha.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Hi kar raha hu madam main aapko.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Shayad ji ne net call shuru hai isliye nahi aata hoga madam.
Executive: Ha sir wahi mere ko bol rahi thi ki aapka net band hai. Chaliye koi baat nahi maine bhej diya aap dekh lijiyega usko. Wo number aap true caller pe bhi check kar lijiyega ki block to nahi hai kyuki aapke paas call to aa rahi hai lekin aap receive nahi kar rahe aur jo aapke paas call aa rahi hogi na wo aapke primary aur secondary number pe aa rahi hogi.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ha. Theek hai? Aur ye ho gaya aur buyleads ke liye sir aapne not relevant buyleads bahut sare mark kiye hue hai. Wrong buyleads mein. Ha.
Executive: Ye neem face wash jo hai aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi madam abhi usko cancel kar dijiye aap.
Executive: To aap sir theek hai main isko hata de rahi hu lekin sir itna bhi aap buyleads agar not relevant mark karenge to buyleads aana band ho jayenge aapke paas. Ha.
Executive: Kya bol rahe madam aap?
Executive: Main keh rahi hu sir aap jitni buyleads aayengi aap usko not relevant agar mark karenge sare hi to fir aapke paas buyleads aana band ho jayengi. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye aloe vera face wash bhi nahi sakte na aap. Ha.
Executive: Hmm usko cancel kar dijiye aap.
Executive: Achcha face wash hatana hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Aapka to hai bhi nahi face wash ka fir bhi aapke paas aa raha hai theek hai isko not relevant mark kar dete hai isko.
Executive: Okay sir aur sir iske alawa koi aur koi bhi problem hogi mere whatsapp wale number pe call kar lijiyega theek hai? Main abhi usi number pe call karungi aapko. Ha.
Executive: Main abhi usi number pe aapko call karungi. Hmm.
Executive: Okay sir thoda din use kariye main aapko monday call karti hu fir bataiyega mujhe ki kya thoda improve hua ya nahi hua hai. Okay.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay.
Executive: Okay sir. Chale madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to increase inquiries on account.

- Customer wants direct calls from customers.

- Customer receiving spam calls.



Resolution:

- Executive provided a number for call-related issues.

- Executive explained about catalog live date.

- Executive informed about the number of inquiries.

- Executive suggested saving the provided number.

- Executive suggested checking the number on Truecaller.

- Executive removed neem face wash from catalog.

- Executive explained marking buyleads as not relevant.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday for feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, buyleads, catalog, spam calls, trucaller
